explains: n. 爱好；由衷的高兴；嗜好

sentences.en: Hers was a minor part, but she played it with gusto.
sentences.cn: 她的角色是个次要人物，但她仍带着热情去表演。

sentences.en: On a visit to an insect farm, she greedily peels the wings and legs off a freeze-dried locust and crunches down with gusto.
sentences.cn: 在她参观一家昆虫农场时，她贪婪地剥下一只冻干的蝗虫的翅膀和腿，然后兴奋地吞下了肚。
